pages.text: 王永才是中国人民大学计算机系副教授，博士生导师。主要研究兴趣包括物联网、机器人、手机移动大数据挖掘与分析，算法设计与分析， 在国际主流会议期刊上发表五十余篇文章，包括JSAC, ACM Computing Surveys, ACM Trans. on Embeded Computing,AAAI, IJCAI, MOBIHOC, INFOCOM, PERCOM, SECON，Ubicomp等，并获得了 Ubicomm2009 和 CWSN2011的最佳论文奖。研究成果在物联网，机器人人机交互、智能感知等领域取得广泛影响和应用。拥有10余项国内国际专利，多项技术转化成果。 Recent PublicationsBook Chapter Yuexuan Wang, Yongcai Wang， Distributed Storage and Parallel Processing in Large-scale Wireless Sensor Networks, Book chapter of High Performance Scientific Computing with special emphasis on Current Capabilities and Future Perspectives, IOS Press, 2011 Journal Paper 1. Yongcai Wang, Tianyuan Sun, Guoyao Rao, Deying Li, Formation Tracking in Sparse Airborne Networks, IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (JSAC) 2018, IF 7.17 (CCF A) This paper studies how to track the 3D topology of UAV network by partially measured inter-distances among the UAVs . It considers the case when the measured inter-UAV distances are sparse and noisy, and the topology of UAV network is changing continuously. This paper exploits the fact that the well-connected subcomponents exist widely and their local structures can be calculated reliably, because the unevenness of node distribution in sparse networks. Therefore, a 3D weighted component stitching (WCS) method to find the reliable components and stitch their local structures with weights is proposed for calculating the formation of the network accurately. It includes a (2-4-star) detection and merging algorithms to extract the reliable global rigid components and a weighted component-based Kalman filter (WCKF) algorithm. Experiments show 21%–48% formation tracking accuracy improvement over existing state-of-the-art methods. 2. Tianyuan Sun, Yongcai Wang, et al., WCS: Weighted Component Stitching for Sparse Network Localization, ACM/IEEE Transactions on Networking (TON), 2018, Volume: 26 , Issue: 5 , Oct. 2018. IF 3.11 （CCF A） This paper studies the network localization problem in sparse networks , which are highly challenging because the graph is generally not global rigid. This paper leverages the facts that there are well-connected subgraphs which can be realized rather confidentially. So it proposes a Weighted Component Stitching (WCS) method to find redundantly rigid components with high redundant ratios to generate reliable local realization. Then the localized components are weightly stitched to produce the global network structure. It proves that finding and ranking the redundantly rigid components is an NP-hard problem. A series of theorems and algorithms to carry out WCS efficiently are therefore proposed. The simulation results show that the localization accuracy can be improved (45%–64%) by WCS over the state-of-the-art algorithms under various settings of sparse networks with different noises. 3. Buke Ao, Yongcai Wang, Hongnan Liu, Deying Li, Lei Song, Jianqiang Li, Context Impacts in Accelerometer-Based Walk Detection and Step Counting. Sensors 18(11): 3604 (2018) (IF 2.8) Various algorithms have been proposed for Walk Detection (WD) and Step Counting (SC), but these algorithms are generally sensitive to the contexts of applications, i.e., (1) the locations of sensor placement; (2) the sensor orientations; (3) the user’s walking patterns; (4) the preprocessing window sizes; and (5) the sensor sampling rates. A thorough understanding of how these dynamic factors affect the algorithms’ performances is investigated and compared in this paper. In particular, representative WD and SC algorithms are introduced according to their design methodologies. A series of experiments is designed in consideration of different application contexts to form an experimental dataset. Different algorithms are then implemented and evaluated on the dataset. The evaluation results provide a quantitative performance comparison indicating the advantages and weaknesses of different algorithms under different application scenarios, giving valuable guidance for algorithm selection in practical applications. 4. pages.text: Yongcai Wang is currently associate professor at the Lab of Intelligent Network, department of Computer Sciences, Renmin University of China. His current research interests include network localization, simultaneously locating and mapping (SLAM), combinatorial optimization and applications. He received his BS and PhD degrees from department of automation sciences and engineering, Tsinghua University in 2001 and 2006 respectively. He worked as associated researcher at NEC Labs. China from 2007-2009. He was an research scientist in Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences, Tsinghua University from 2009-2015. He was visiting scholar at Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering of Cornell University in 2015. He has more than 10 patients and has publised more than 50 papers in top-tier conferences and journals. He was demo session chair of CWSN2011, commitee member of CWSN2013, IThings2013. He is member of IEEE, China Computer Federation (CCF) and Chinese Association of Automation (CAA). He is member of the professional committee of DEDS of CAA. If it were possible to reduce energy consumption of HVAC subsystems a few percent, a significant quantity of electricity would be saved. From 2012 to 2013, we conducted field studies and developed autonomous control system for saving energy of HVAC systems in Beijing subway stations. posts.title: 在hexo主页中添加百度分享
posts.text: 在hexo中使用wikitten模板时添加百度分享的方法。网上查找在hexo中添加链接分享的方法是，查到的都是用next主题的，用wikitten主题时，如何添加分享并没有介绍。 自己翻了一下代码，发现wikitten主题的结构非常清楚。 首先，在_config.xml中的share选项中的几个分享的选项 12# Shareshare: bdshare # options: jiathis, bdshare, addtoany, default 在\themes\Wikitten\layout\share文件夹中都有对应的文件。 打开bdshare.ejs 可以把现在已经不存在的开心网，腾讯微博的链接去掉，只保留qq空间，新浪微博和微信123456<div class="bdsharebuttonbox"> <a href="#" class="bds_more" data-cmd="more"> 分享到：</a> <a href="#" class="bds_qzone" data-cmd="qzone" title="分享到QQ空间">QQ空间</a> <a href="#" class="bds_tsina" data-cmd="tsina" title="分享到新浪微博">新浪微博</a> <a href="#" class="bds_weixin" data-cmd="weixin" title="分享到微信">微信</a></div> 之后把保存的bdshare.ejs放到\themes\Wikitten\layout\common目录下 修改common目录下的article.ejs。article.ejs就是决定着hexo生成的静态文件的布局。我们可以把分享链接放到文章的标题栏的日期的位置1234567891011121314151617181920212223<div class="article-meta"> <%- partial('post/category') %> <%- partial('post/tag') %> <%- partial('post/date', { class_name: 'article-date', date_format: null }) %> <%- partial('share/bdshare') %> <% if (theme.plugins.busuanzi_count) { %> <i class="fa fa-bar-chart"></i> <span id="busuanzi_container_site_pv"><span id="busuanzi_value_page_pv"></span></span> <% } %> <% if (theme.history_control.enable) { let repertory_address = `${theme.history_control.server_link}/${theme.history_control.user}/${theme.history_control.repertory}`; let file_path = `${theme.history_control.branch}/source/${post.source}`;%> <div class="article-meta-button"> <a href='<%= `${repertory_address}/raw/${file_path}` %>'> Source </a> </div> <div class="article-meta-button"> <a href='<%= `${repertory_address}/edit/${file_path}` %>'> Edit </a> </div> <div class="article-meta-button"> <a href='<%= `${repertory_address}/commits/${file_path}` %>'> History </a> </div> <% } %></div> 如上述的代码，把1<%- partial('share/bdshare') %> 放到了1<%- partial('post/date', { class_name: 'article-date', date_format: null }) %> 的后面。 这样，在每个页面中就可以看到百度分享的链接: 参考资料 ApacheCN_飞龙的CSDN博客，但是不完全一样 PigPeek的简书博客，也不太一样

posts.title: 解决latexdiff处理section改动出错的问题
posts.text: $$latexdiff 处理section, subsection时的问题 用latexdiff对两个tex文件进行了比较，得到记录变化的tex文档。但是在修改标题section和子标题subsection的时候会到一些问题。这是latexdiff自动生成的代码：1\subsection{\DIFdel{Experimental design of model domain sensitivity}} 编译时会出现如下错误 1234567891011121314151617Argument of \UL@word has an extra }. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Paragraph ended before \UL@word was complete. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Illegal unit of measure (pt inserted). \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}} 为解决这一问题，在latexdiff的命令中加入 1latexdiff --exclude-textcmd="section,subsection,subsubsection" temp.tex revise.tex > diff.tex 即可解决这个问题。 参考资料 latexdiff手册
